about_the_game:
Desperate to lose his virginity, Shinya resorts to the occult to summon a demon, a succubus …anything with a pussy to finally pop his cherry! The results were unexpected because the ritual he looked up online actually worked and not only did he summon Alsiel, a high-ranking demon, but Neito, the Goddess of Love, popped out right behind her!

This is destiny at work, right? Shinya and Neito are reunited and they'll be so madly in love, have babies, get married, AND NO OTHER WOMAN WILL EVER TOUCH HIM WITH THEIR FILTHY HANDS AGAIN!!!

Forget about a demon's promise when you have a devoted goddess straight out of hentai heaven! Honestly, why settle for anything less than a “Snatch made in Heaven!”

-Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
-Neito and Alsiel are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
-Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
-Hours of story content
-Audio including music and special effects
-Enhanced with character sprite animations
-Gallery and Scene selections
-Scene Studio with a customizable prompt to create a custom scene with in-game assets
-14 scenes utterly devoting yourself to a beautiful goddess!

Yandere Goddess: A Snatch Made in Heaven Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

** PLEASE NOTE **
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Was there a 2-for-1 deal on summons happening?
Nothing bad ever happens in public parks, right?
Nothing like a little butt stuff to cure what ails you~
Remember you safeword when ropes are involved!
Neito won't get jealous of her own baby, right...?

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes in the game that include: nudity, sexual jokes/innuendo, and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: Every man's dream is to be eternally bound to a beautiful, loving Goddess (according to this goddess at least!) Forget about the women of this world and devote yourself entirely to a Yandere Goddess who will love you forever!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
